header.div: The sentences 1-10 below suggest ways of dealing with the problem of youth unemployment, which is the topic of the writing task in the next exercise. Complete the sentences by putting the correct phrase or clause into each gap.

section.span: a. help young people find the right course of higher education and a job which suits them
b. young people can continue learning instead of being unemployed when they leave school
c. they have more of an incentive to leave home and look for a job
e. encouraging them to take on more young people
d. encourage job mobility among the young
f. make school leavers more attractive to potential employers
g. prepare themselves better for jobs in the new economy
h. help them start up their own businesses
i. they can choose courses and careers that they are suited for
j. providing young people with practical work experience
